author: zizi3988
content:
<@686695036733227017> What is the best approach and  and is there a centralized platform where where we can track the advancements of the upcoming Ethereum fork, akin to a project management tool?
I came across this link https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/dencun/, but  is it the most recommended site for this purpose?

author: mariohavel
content:
What you are generally looking for is PM repository https://github.com/ethereum/pm
It's mainly to track discussion, organize calls which you can follow and in context of the upcoming upgrade, checkout https://github.com/ethereum/pm/blob/master/Breakout-Room/4844-readiness-checklist.md
